definitions.definition: touch with the lips as a sign of love, sexual desire, reverence, or greeting.
examples: he kissed her on the lips
synonyms: lock lips; formal/humorousosculate "he kissed her on the lips"

definitions.definition: (of a ball) lightly touch (another ball) in passing.
a touch with the lips in kissing.
examples: peck, smack, smooch, buss, French kiss, X; osculation a kiss on the cheek

definitions.definition: a slight touch of a ball against another ball.
used to express affection at the end of a letter (conventionally represented by the letter X).
examples: she sent lots of love and a whole line of kisses

definitions.definition: a small cake or cookie, typically a meringue.
a small candy, especially one made of chocolate.
